description: This PHP source file handles AJAX requests related to network diagnostic tools, including connectivity tests (ping), trace route operations for IPv4 and IPv6, and response processing.

methods.name: setStr
methods.description: Sets configuration string values for network diagnostics parameters.

methods.name: getStr
methods.description: Retrieves current values of network diagnostics parameters.

methods.name: validLink
methods.description: Validates the destination address for ping operations.

methods.name: validIPAddr
methods.description: Validates an IP address format (IPv4 or IPv6).

methods.name: getInstanceIds
methods.description: Retrieves instance IDs for trace route hop data.
